column1: nice delivery, tight on middle stump. Lands on length and angles into the right-hander. Defended off the back foot
back of a length on leg stump, and gets big on the big man. He uncomfortably fends off the back foot
awry line. Wide outside leg stump, and angling further away. Dhoni does well to scamper to his left and intercept

streaky! Back of a length on middle, and hurries onto Shahzad's body. Too close to his body for the cut, and the ball takes an edge and pops over the slip cordon. Runs into the boundary for four. India won't mind that
length ball on leg stump, and Shahzad whips this off his hips to square leg
good length on leg stump, and he glances this off the back foot to point
short on leg, and Shahzad half-ducks before pulling this square to fine leg for a single.
length ball swinging away wide outside off, left alone
length ball slanting into the corridor. Half a stride as he jabs on the front foot and gets it to mid-on
length on off stump, blocked off the back foot
he's seen enough. Walks down the pitch, gets under the outswinger and drills it over cover
length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
length ball shapes away from the corridor but Shahzad is down the pitch to meet it much before it can get into its full movement. Contorsts weirdly as he whips this wide of mid-on
shot! Nothing quite like a straight lofted shot. Khaleel can't find the swing in from a full length. Shahzad gets the front leg out of the way and crashes it over him
narrowly misses Shahzad's stomach. This rises steeply and comes back in a touch after shaping away from short of a length. Flies over the stumps as he lets it go
short of a length and wide outside off, jabbed down to third man
length on off stump, defended solidly into the covers
length on off stump, defended into the covers
chipped into the midwicket area as he loses his shape. This is a short ball going across his body and he can't get behind the line
length on leg stump, allows it to come on and jabs it past square leg with a closed face
chips again but he's in control this time. Length ball into his pads and he uses the climb to get this over square leg
length outside off, gets forward and runs it down to third man off the outside half

beamer. Chahar looks to bowl a full slower ball and loses control. His first enduring memory of ODI cricket will be Shahzad looking down at him and yelling at him. It dips at the batsman but is clearly over his waist. First warning has been given. He'll be suspended from bowling if he bowls a beamer again.
wide. Another slower ball, this one is a bouncer. It's dug in too short and it rises over his head
another wide. That slower ball isn't working at the moment, huh? Tries it again, goes for the bouncer again and this time he gets it way away from the wide marker on the off side
slugged over the mdwicket boundary. Dug himself a hole, had to go back to the stock ball. It's a length ball on middle stump. That's easy for Shahzad. Front foot out of the way and bang
length on off stump, tapped to mid-on off the front foot
slapped over square leg. Chahar drops it short, Shahzad gets back easily and doesn't even try to keep this down
short of a length on off stump, defended into the covers off the back foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length ball slanted across off stump, defended to point off the outside half
short of a length on off stump, defended to point
short of a length just outside off, slanted across him. Looks to run it to third man but Rahul leaps to his right from gully to stop the ball
length on off stump, opens the face and can't get it past point. A maiden for Khaleel.
length ball swung away from off stump, opens his arms up and slaps through the line. Can't get it past cover point
length outside off, gets the whirlwind hands out at it again but can't beat the ring once again
bang. We know who the best batsman would be in a tennis-ball only Asia Cup. This is a length ball on off stump, he isn't on top of the bounce. Gets under it somehow and carves it wide of mid-off
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off, backs away and jabs it to to third man's left

clears the boundary again. Khaleel's just come in with a maiden over previously but Shahzad is here to disrupt. Full ball outside off, front leg out of the way, another drill over the long-on boundary
slower ball dropped short outside off, swings and roundabouts for no connection
short of a length offcutter jagging away from the corridor. Looks to stab at it to get it down to third man but is beaten
short ball up at his ribs. He drops the bat and allows it to go
nicely placed. Short ball outside off, steps out and squeezes it between point and backward point. Jadeja gives chase and keeps it to two
bouncer rising above his back shoulder and his hook is too slow. Fizzes through to Dhoni
full on off stump, jammed back to the bowler
beaten. What a ball. Angles in at middle stump and jumps past the outside edge. It's a semi-new ball turning like that
length ball in at middle stump, backs away and hurriedly chops into the covers
length on off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and turning away from off stump, slashes and misses
full on middle stump, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
short of a length in the corridor, opens the face and runs it to backward point
oh that's poor bowling. Drops it short outside off, Shahzad shuffles and hammers the pull in front of square. He's not mistiming many today, certainly not this one
clattered. Once again, manages to get under a length ball. The key is how much room he has - it's very wide outside off. He crouches on his back leg and launches it to the extra cover boundary
length on middle stump, tapped to mid-on off the front foot

dropped at mid-off and a fifty for Shahzad! Rayudu can't hold onto what he'll consider an easy catch. It was full on off stump, he was looking to go over mid-off but this came off the inside half of the bat. Hung up for Rayudu to his right and he couldn't hold it with the reverse cup
length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
none at at all! Backs away in anticipation of Jadeja's stump-to-stump line and swats it against the turn over the midwicket boundary
length at the stumps, backs away and cuts to cover
beaten in flight but his shot lands short of mid-on. Jadeja slows it down and makes him step out. He drags it across the line off the toe-end
short of a length on off, backs away and chops to point
dropped short on middle stump, backs away and mistimes the pull to midwicket
forces him to leave. He's backing away again, into the leg side. Jadeja chucks it wide outside off and he can't reach it
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
googly at a length on off, blocked into the covers
tossed up on leg stump, gets down and swipes hard. Rockets to long leg's left
quicker one on a length at off stump, backs away and taps back to the bowler off the back foot
front-of-the-hand quicker one outside off. Already forcing the bowler on the defensive. Stabbed into the covers with the angle
beaten. Nicely bowled. Googly, loopy and slow at a full length outside off. Past his attempted slog
length on off stump, spinning in at middle stump, tapped to midwicket
length ball pushed through in the corridor, defended off the back foot
length ball wide outside off, mistimed drive to extra cover
full on off stump, gets forward and flicks to square leg
full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
length on middle stump, gets forward and jabs to midwicket's left
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
length on off stump, some turn away too. Blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, ripping away in the corridor as he looks to cut. Beaten

Dhoni's whipped the stumps and this should be out. Full ball on middle stump, he looks to drive and is beaten on the inside edge. It trickles to Dhoni off the pad and the batsman isn't anywhere close to making his move backwards when the stumps are broken.
length on off stump, solidly blocked on the front foot
short of a length and spinning away from off stump. Backs away and his weight is moving into the leg side as he reaches out at this. Thick outside edge past slip
short of a length skidder at middle stump, backs away and taps it back to the bowler
full on off stump, driven to extra cover
shot. Full ball drifts away slowly from him outside off as he steps out. He's reached a long way out and jammed it between cover and extra cover

boom. Length on off and he does what a lot of batsman don't against Kedar - gets the front leg out of the way. Face the unconventional with the unconventional. Creats swinging room and sends this straight
short of a length wide outside off, backs away and slices uppishly towards cover point
length on off stump, tapped to the bowler off the back foot
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off

oh good shot. Quicker one outside off from Jadeja, dropped slightly short of a length. Not a lot of room, not a lot of bounce, but he's shown tremendous agility to swivel and pull this to the deep midwicket boundary
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

through him! Lovely bowling from Jadeja! Length ball on off. He's been turning it away from him from there. This one goes with the arm. Rahmat jabbing outside off stump with a gap between bat and pad. Clean bowled.
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length and turning in at off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, opens his stance and drives to long-off

what a ball! Oh this is glorious from Kuldeep. Makes him flick against the line and spins it past the blade to have him stumped in the off side.Lovely stuff. Brett Lee on air says it's like watching Warne in the mirror. He's not wrong. This dips and drifts and lands on a length at leg stump. Shahidi doesn't get to the pitch as he closes the face and his back leg raises as a result. He has no chance
he's on a hat-trick! Through the captain's defense! Loopy delivery on a length. Lands on middle, turns into Asghar, flicks his pads, and then crashes into leg stump
overpitched on off stump, and the batsman comes forward to push this away to cover. Safely negated
tossed up outside off again, and the cover drive takes an inside edge towards the leg side
good length on middle, and this one is the wrong'un. He rocks back to defend off the back foot
good length on off, and fended off the back foot

length ball wide outside off, and Shahzad rocks back to cut this square to deep point for two. He's scampering back for the second, but MSD flicks the ball onto the stumps and appeals for the run-out. The umpire is not interested
good length on middle, and he pulls this off the back foot to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, and defended off the front foot to the leg side. Jadeja runs to his right to intercept
full on middle, and he caresses an on-drive to long on to get off the mark
wide outside off, and spinning further away. Shahzad plays no shot and the umpire spreads his arms
full outside off, and Shahzad walks across towards the delivery, before swinging across the line to deep midwicket for a single
back of a length outside leg stump, and going across the batsman. He goes onto the back foot, and taps this to midwicket
tossed up just outside off, and he goes down on one knee to clobber this over the non-striker. Long on's there to protect the boundary
full just outside off, and he drives with the spin towards the leg side. Comes off the bat's inside half and dribbles away to square leg
full just outside off, and he carefully gets onto the front foot to defend
good length outside leg stump, and spinning into the batsman's pads. Flicked off the back foot to the leg side
full on middle, and Naib gets onto the back foot to whip this square to the leg side. Sees the over out
full outside off, but Shahzad walks across to the off side, and paddles a sweep right past short fine leg!
slogged into the stands! Loopy outside off, and enough time to swing across the line, and Shahzad deposits this six into cow corner
appeal for lbw but impact's outside off. Shahzad tries to sweep this from outside off again, but loses his balance on this occasion
length ball outside off, and zipping straight through. Punched off the back foot to cover
full outside off, and spinning away from Shahzad. He tries to sweep but misses. Shahzad wants the wide, but not given
full toss aimed at his pads, and Shahzad punches this straight to long on for a walking single
good length outside leg stump, and that's been caressed off the back foot to the leg side
good length on leg stump again, and he opens his bat's face to push this to cover
loopy outside leg stump, and lands full near his toes. Shahzad takes a big stride forward and defends
flatter outside leg stump, and Shahzad moves towards the ball, before punching this square to Chahal at deep midwicket
full on leg, and spinning across the right-hander. Carefully defended off the front foot with the angled bat. Pushed to point
extra flight on off, and he chips this right over DK at cover! His full-stretched dive to his left was just millimeters away from the ball
full on off stump, and that's been smashed into the stands! Welcomes Khaleel's new spell with a cross-batted slog right into the hands of the Afghan fans near deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, and Shahzad can't connect with the attempted cut. Through to MSD

Shahzad reviews! Back of a length outside off, and he misses the pull shot. The ball goes through to MSD and they appeal for a caught-behind. Given by the umpire but Shahzad is certain it's come off his shoulder. Replays concur so Shahzad survives.
back of a length outside off, and he opens his bat's face to dab this down to third man for a walking single.
fuller just outside off, and that's been fended off the front foot towards Shahzadat the other end
back of a length outside off, and he stands tall to confidently punch this back to the bowler
full just outside leg stump, and Shahzad takes a big stride forward to fend with the angled bat to the off side
full just on off stump, and he comes forward to defend
good length outside leg stump, and flicked off the back foot to square leg
full just outside off, and he gets to the pitch of the ball. Defends thereafter with soft hands
good length on off, but spinning into Naib. He offers no shot and the ball hits his front leg. Too high though
full just outside off, and pushed straight by the batsman. But the ball comes off his inside-edge and trickles away to the leg side
back of a length outside off, and Shahzad tries to pull. But the ball hits his inside-half and ricochets onto his back leg. Could've easily been bowled there
good length outside off stump, and goes through to the keeper as the batsman lets it go
length ball outside off, but angling into his pads. Flicked away to the leg side
back of a length just outside off stump, and he fends off the back foot
back of a length outside off again, and he rides the bounce to block off the back foot
back of a length outside off, and he pushes this away from his body. Takes the outside of his bat and dribbles away to third man
full just outside off, and spinning across the batsman. Tried to defend but the ball sneaks past his outside edge
full on off, and he uses his wrists to flick this towards midwicket
full on off, and he comes down the ground to smack this back to the bowler. Kuldeep does well to intercept on his followthrough
tossed up on middle, and Naib goes down on one knee to sweep. Connects it well, but Kaul's manning the boundary on that side
full outside off stump, and his attempted cover drive is inside-edged towards the leg side
good length on middle, and spinning away from Shahzad. He rocks back and taps this back to Kuldeep
full just outside off, and carefully fended off the front foot
length ball on off, and Naib rocks back to fend off the back foot
full on off, and the straight-bat defense takes the outside edge. Falls just past the first-slip fielder's right and rolls away to third man for a single
good length outside off, and he whips this off the back foot to wide long on for a walking single
back of a length on off, and fended once again off the back foot
fuller on off, and defended straight down the ground. Misfield from Jadeja means they can take a single
good length ball angling in, and it hits his front leg. A muted appeal from the bowler as the impact was just too high
length ball on middle, and he muscles a mistimed pull to the leg side. Rahul gives it a chase, and manages to pull the ball back from way inside the boundary
top-edged to the fine-leg boundary! Short on middle stump, and he's pulled this right over the keeper's head
full on off stump, and he displays the bat's full face. Defended
length ball just outside off, and he firmly defends off the front foot. Stopped by Kaul
full on middle, and he whips this off his toes to the gap on the leg side. Rahul's there in the deep
good length on middle, and he defends off the back foot to mid on
full on off stump, and he carefully fends off the front foot. Rolls back to Jaddu
good length on leg stump, and he flicks it off his pads to deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, and Shahzad sticks his bat out and runs this to short third man. Tried to pierce the gap but misses out
back of a length on middle, and he taps this off the back foot to point for a quick single. He's got to hurry.. but manages to complete it
full just outside off, and blocked off the front foot. Shahzad to have strike next over
short just outside off, and Shahzad's happy to see the ball go through into the hands of MSD
full outside off, and he plays a late cut - with zero footwork - to third man for a single. Moves on to 99
good length on middle, and blocked off the back foot to mid on. They say no for a single
short on off stump, and he ducks under the line of the ball. First bouncer of the over, says the umpire
good length on off, but angling into the right-hander. Firmly struck back past the bowler to mid on
back of a length outside off, and nudged off the back foot to point. Shahzad to take the strike next over
back of a length on leg stump, and he flicks this to the fine-leg boundary for a hundred! Takes his helmet out and raises his bat to celebrate. The crowd's on their feet!
full on leg stump, and he misses the leg-side flick. Hits his front leg and rolls over to square leg
back of a length just outside off, and he offers his bat's full face to defend. The ball trickles away to mid off

full on middle, and he walks down the ground to flick this off his toes. Struck well actually, but struck just too well. Straight into the hands of deep backward square as Chahar takes his maiden ODI wicket!
back of a length on off stump, and Shahzad backs away to work this towards the leg side with soft hands
short on off and Nabi's taking no chances. Ducks under this delivery as the ball goes to MSD on the bounce
flat on middle, and angling into the batsman's body. He tries to make room, but can only muscle a shot to Jadeja at midwicket
flat on middle again, and this is flat-batted to long on for a single
full just outside off, and he goes across the line to paddle a sweep down to short fine leg
half-tracker on middle, but angling into Shahzad. He backs away to try and cut, but can't find the gap on the off side
slow on off stump, and he flat-bats a shot to mid on. No single
overpitched on middle and leg, and Shahzad picks his back leg up, and then drills a drive down to long on
great wrists! Full on middle stump, and Shahzad beautifully flicks this off his toes over the cow-corner boundary! Beautiful shot to look at
back of a length on middle, and the ball loops over the batsman's head
back of a length on middle, and he nudges this off his pads to deep midwicket
full on middle, and he uses his wrists once again, to flick this fine to the fielder manning the boundary
back of a length on middle, but it's the slower ball from Chahar. Shahzad tries to swing across the line, and the ball hits his lower back. Shahzad whimpers in pain as he rubs his back
short on leg stump, and Shahzad half-ducks under the ball. Through to MSD on the bounce
good length outside off, and he slaps a cut in front of square. Stopped by cover
full on leg stump, and he misses the attempted sweep. Hits his front leg, but the appeal is turned down. Was definitely going down the leg side
overpitched on middle, and he drills this straight to mid on. Jadeja's sharp fielding ensures it's another dot ball
full just outside off, and cut off the back foot to point. Fourth dot
slow through the air, and lands full just outside off. Tapped off the back foot to long off for one
Jadhav bowls this from very close to the stumps. Lands full on off, and Shahzad slaps this once again past the fielder at cover for a single
length ball outside off, but too wide reckons the umpire. Kaul can't accurately bowl the attempted knuckleball
back of a length outside off, but Shahzad waits for the ball to come to him, and then cuts this square to deep point for a single
back of a length outside off, and the ball gets big on Nabi as he fends this with the angled bat to point
back of a length on middle stump, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
full just outside off, and he tries to carve this over the fielder at point. Misses
full just outside off, and he drills a straight drive back past the bowler. Goes to mid off though

full toss wide outside off stump, but Shahzad shuffles across to the off side, and tries to ramp this fine past the fielder at short fine-leg. Doesn't get the optimal contact off his bat, and therefore can't collect any run
full just outside off, and he drives this towards the on-side off the front foot. Protection at mid on
loopy on off stump, and spinning into Nabi. He makes some room, and cuts this towards the off side
good length just outside off. Fended off the back foot
full on off stump once again, and Nabi uses his wrists to whip this away to midwicket. Fourth dot of the over
full outside leg stump, and this time Nabi crunches a sweep past the fielder at deep backward square! Classy way to take Afghanistan past 150
full just outside off, and he works this off his toes to deep backward square for a single.
bouncer in the corridor outside off, sways away from it
short of a length just outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
length on off stump, punched to sweeper cover
yorker hooping in at leg stump. Clears the front leg and taps it to long-on
clears midwicket. That's a powerful hit. Short ball on off stump, he walks into the ball and clubs the pull off the front foot
length ball outside off, opens the face and slices to third man
leading edge falls short of short third man. Tossed up at off stump, not to the pitch after stepping out and he looks to drill it into the leg side. It slid on with the slingy arm
well played. No one deep on the off side so Shahzad opens the face after stepping out and lifts it over cover
short of a length at the stumps, backs away and pulls on the bounce to midwicket
beaten, trying to hit an inside-out cover drive from outside the pitch on the leg side. Yes. He's backed away that much to try and find the gap but this skids low
length on the stumps, tapped back to the bowler
length on middle stump, on the back foot to punch to long-on
yorker on middle stump, backs into the leg side and jams it to mid-off
length on middle stump, whipped on the up to mid-on
short of a length outside off, jabbed to third man

overthrows as short third man aims at the stumps and Shahzad makes no effort to get back in! Incredibly nonchalant. He was outside the crease as he chopped this on the bounce to Jadhav. Gets a single at long-on in the end
clean. Nice swing through the line. It's a full ball on off stump, he stays tall and pumps it straight over the bowler
length on off stump, defended to extra cover off the front foot
length ball skidding on off stump, backs away and chips to long-off's left
short of a length on middle stump, punched to midwicket off the back foot
gets a boot on it as Nabi steps out and pummels this towards long-on. Jadhav with the length ball first and then a reaction with his right leg
length on leg stump, switches around and plays a back-hand to extra cover with a left-handers's grip

holes out to long-off. Jadhav goes horizontal with the delivery and it dips on a length outside off. Shahzad doesn't get to the pitch after stepping out and can only slice this high. Good bowling to end a high-impact innings. Shahzad returns, but he's kept Afghanistan alive
short ball on the pads, tapped to square leg off the back foot
short ball at off stump, defended to extra cover off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and runs it to point
short and wide outside off, jabbed to third man
short ball at the hips from around the wicket, gets on top of the bounce and dabs it to short fine's left
short ball outside off, chopped to sweeper cover's left
short ball in the corridor, defended to point
lbw appeal turned down. He was looking to sweep from outside off, was struck on the back thigh. Might have been struck outside the line and that's probably what India think
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on middle stump, sweeps aerially out to long leg
misfield from Khaleel at backward point. Length ball on off is thoroughly whipped with a reverse sweep and he just doesn't pick the spin
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
beaten. Lovely bowling. Najibullah stays put as he looks to defend and this rips past the outside edge from a length
short ball wide outside off, cut straight to point
short ball wide outside off, pulls to deep square's right
short ball just outside off, carved to third man off the back foot
beautiful. Length ball from around the wicket, angled into his off stump at 142kph, but he's used strong wrists to punch this wide of mid-off
length at the pads, nudged to deep square leg
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover on the up
length ball on off stump, plonks the front leg across and plays the paddle. It seems to have run fine off his thigh but it's been given runs
length on middle stump, down for the reverse sweep again and he gets it wide of the backward point fielder this time
googly not picked. Length on off, he's looking to defend for the turn into him and is beaten
oh he's picked this one! Length ball at a similar line outside off, coming into him and he has clubbed it 96 metres with a clean hit over midwicket
full on leg stumps, swept to deep square
great adjustment! This looked very very full and he looked like he would be trapped playing the lbw, but he's got rapid hands to swipe under this and get it flying out to the deep square boundary
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off with the turn
short ball outside off, backs away and cuts to point
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and turning into the stumps. Drops it into the midwicket region with soft hands
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
oh that's poor bowling. Dropped short outside off and it's easy for Nabi. Rocks back and slices to the backward point fence
short ball wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right
full on middle stump, paddled straight to short fine
full on leg stump, allows it to come on and gently places this to deep square's right to come back for a second and reach his fifty.
length on leg stump, swept to deep backward square
full on off stump, driven back to the bowler with the turn
full outside off, driven to long-off

that looks plumb. The batsman reviews the lbw decision. He's been given out. Trapped in front attempting a reverse sweep and only connection with bat can save him I think...he's struck on the back thigh in front of off stump. There's no bat on this. He's gone. Three reds and the review is gone. There was hardly any doubt about that, with Jadeja's natural line
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover with the turn
Minimal deviation away from the corridor. Length ball shooting past his outside edge
short of a length outside off, backs away and is beaten on the cut
length outside off, driven to long-off's left
length on off stump, driven towards long-off but can't get it past extra cover
short of a length wide outside off, punched to long-off's left
googly dropped short outside off, backs away and chops to sweeper cover
googly at a length on middle stump, defended to cover off the front foot
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
googly, short and wide outside off. Backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
short of a length on leg stump, pushed back towards the bowler off the back foot
pumped into the top tier! What a hit! 99 metres. Length ball on middle stump, stays deep in the crease and clobbers this cleanly. Proper batsman, proper slogger...he's all of them
full and wide outside off, sliced to sweeper cover
short of a length outside off, short-arm pull out to deep midwicket
yorker on off stump, dropped to extra cover's right and his misguided throw results in an overthrow at deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, driven down to long-on
low full toss outside off, looks to flick this between short fine and square leg but an inside edge pings off his pad and into the leg side
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and chops to short third man
slower ball dug in short of a length outside off. Makes room for the cut but he's beaten because of the variation

taken by extra cover who then bumps into mid-off as well. Kuldeep the fielder, Karthik the man running in from mid-off. They end it all with a graceful co-ordinated tumble. Nabi was looking to clear them both but once again, the offcutter gets the better of him. He's only able to chip this length ball gently in the end
short of a length outside off, nudged down to third man off the thick outside edge
yorker on middle stump, tapped to extra cover from deep in the crease
length on leg stump, blocked off the inside half
full ball outside off, a giant swing at this but he's got this off the toe-end to extra cover
inswinging yorker in the corridor, poked wide of extra cover with an open face
yorker on middle stump, backs away and tries to go off side, but he gets an inside edge onto back boot
yorker again, on middle stump. A harmless toe-ended drive towards long-off is all that's possible
yorker on off stump, big inside edge as he looks to drive through cover. It trickles down to long-on
low full toss wide outside off, makes too much room as he looks to hit this to point. Beaten comprehensively
slower short ball at off stump, looks to cut over extra cover, chips it over the bowler off the toe-end
length outside off, backs away and drives to sweeper cover
short and wide slower ball outside off, looks to play the cut but it climbs over the blade
another slower ball, dropped short outside off. Drags it towards long-on and comes back for the second. The fielder goes for the striker's  and hits direct but Rashid has just made the ground
slower short ball wide outside off, pulls it out to deep midwicket...and now he's clutching his right hamstring. Hasn't taken the run. Chucks the gloves off. He's in trouble.
another slower ball dropped short and angled across him. Can't get connection on this cut either
length ball wide outside off, and Rahul rides the bounce to cut this from the top of the ball. Pierces the gap between point and cover point
good length on off, and angling into Rahul's body. Flicked off his hips to the leg side
length ball angling in, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket. No chance of a single
length ball angling down leg, but Rahul manages to get his bat to it. Whipped off his hips to deep backward square to give Rayudu the strike
good length on off, and the ball tails sharply inwards after bouncing. Rayudu swivels and mistimes a pull to Mujeeb at fine leg

trickled past the keeper! Given legbyes by the umpire as Rahul tries to play a deft flick past the diving Mohammad Shahzad. Replays suggest that it came off his thighpad. Another delivery that was angling into Rahul's body
length ball on middle, and he tries to whip this off his pads. Hits his leg, and trickles away to short fine leg
full outside off, and Rayudu gets to the pitch of the delivery to drive. Stopped by cover
back of a length on middle, and he swivels to pull this straight to the sweeper fielder at deep backward square
full just outside off, and Rahul uses his feet to try and get to the pitch of the ball. He's halfway down, and therefore mistimes a drive to the off side
slower through the air as it lands full on off stump. Caressed down the ground, past the mid-on fielder for a single
full, but wide outside off. Gentle inswingers from Mujeeb for now, and Rayudu taps this away to cover point
full just outside off, and tapped with soft hands towards cover point for a quick single
good length just outside off. Rayudu takes a couple of steps forward, and fends with the straight bat
length ball outside off, but tailing inwards. Carefully blocked off the back foot
slapped for six! Length ball outside off, and Rayudu attacks the ball, before slashing hard at this. Frees his arms, and the ball flies over the point-boundary for half-a-dozen!
slower ball, but full outside off. Rayudu mistimes a drive to midwicket. Just 111kph
slower ball again to end the over. More like the offcutter. Lands on a length outside off, and he blocks this off the back foot with soft hands
length ball just outside off, and fended
full just outside off, and drifting into his pads. Defended
full on off, and he lifts his back leg to whip a drive to midwicket. Three dots
full on off again, and the leg-side whip finds midwicket once more
full on leg stump, and he tries to work it towards midwicket. Takes a leading edge, and pops over to the off side. Maiden over
slower ball to start the over. Just 105kph, and Rayudu muscles an on-drive past midwicket for one

back of a length outside off, and Rahul tries to punch at this delivery. The ball angles slightly away from him, and whizzes past his outside edge. Shahzad appeals for the caught-behind, but Aftab knows there's no contact with the bat

wide outside off, and Rahul uses his fast hands to try and cut this square. But the ball stays low and goes under the bat. Shahzad and Aftab go up in unison for a caught-behind appeal but the umpire isn't interested
full just outside off, and driven with the angled bat to Hashmat at cover point. He dives to his right and ensures the ball doesn't race away for four

very full just outside off, and he taps this down the ground to mid off for a single. Slight hesitation and a direct-hit at the bowler's end as well. The third umpire says... not out! Rahul was comfortably past the crease
low full toss on off, and that's been whipped off his toes to Javed at cow corner
good length just outside off, and he rocks back onto the back foot. Flicks to midwicket

full just outside off, and he defends to cover with soft hands. Mujeeb appeals for the lbw, assuming it's pad first and then bat. But Asghar chooses not to review. It is pad first, according to the replays, and impact was on off stump too! Replays show Rayudu would've been out
good length just outside off, and Rahul comes down the wicket to punch this past Nabi at cover. But he dives to his right and stops the ball, saving three runs for sure
lifted over cover! Nabi can't stop this one. Full just outside off again, and Rayudu swung through the line - with the angled bat - to clobber the ball to the long-off boundary
good length outside off, but angling in after pitching. Rayudu works it towards the off side
good length just outside off, and defended with the straight bat to see the over out
good length outside off, and he tries to punch towards cover. The ball takes an inside edge, and ricochets onto his back leg. Almost rolls onto the stumps
back of a length outside off, but this is much slower (107kph) from Aftab. Punched with the angled bat to deep point for a single
full on middle, and he swings through the line and deposits the ball into the wide long-on boundary. Finds the gap between midwicket and mid on
good length outside off stump, and skids through! Rayudu tries to punch this off the back foot, but he's beaten by the pace! Through to Shahzad
length ball wide outside off, and Rayudu slashes hard at this and sends the ball past the diving cover-point fielder for four!
back of a length just outside off, and he defends with soft hands off the back foot
full on off stump, and Rahul shuffles across to the off side to defend off the back foot
good length on middle, and Rahul walks down the ground to punch with the straight bat
flighted on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to convert the delivery into a full toss. Struck hard to mid off for a quick single
good length on off, and he works this with soft hands to square leg. Another early call for a quick single
full outside off stump. Straightens after pitching, and Rahul taps this off the front foot to cover point
good length on off, and angling into his pads. Worked away to midwicket off the back foot
starts off with a full-pitched ball on middle and leg, and Rahul whips this away off his toes to deep midwicket! Classy
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to punch this with the straight bat to cover
full toss wide outside off, and Rahul's eyes pop up! Puts this freebie away by smacking this off the front foot past cover. The bowler has no one to blame but himself
full on middle, but angling into his pads. Worked off the front foot to midwicket
back of a length outside off, and Rahul dabs this fine to Shahzad's right for a single. The keeper gets a direct-hit at the batsman's end, but Rayudu was comfortably in
length ball on middle, but Rayudu dances down the wicket, and flat-bats a pull straight over long on! Pure muscle as India go past 50
full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
lifted over extra cover! It's a length ball outside off, and Rahul simply takes a few steps down the wicket, and then lets the bat do the rest
length ball, spinning inwards, and Rahul uses his wrists to whip this square over midwicket. Beautiful shot, but there's protection in the deep
full on off, and Rayudu gets down on one knee to try and paddle this fine. Misses out as the ball hits his body
full outside off, and Rayudu walks down the ground, before flicking this to wide mid-on
full on leg stump, and Rayudu's attempted sweep hits his back leg. Wants the single, but Rahul sends him back
full on leg stump, and he clips this off the front foot to deep midwicket for a single
full and wide outside off. It was the slower ball though, so Rayudu had to wait for eternity before playing the square drive to the fielder in the deep
good length just outside off, and that's been tapped off the front foot to point with soft hands
full on middle, and Rayudu looked to tee off. But he spots the slower ball (98 kph) and adjusts his shot. Checks it into a defensive shot towards mid off
slower ball again, but wide outside off stump. He wedges the shot right onto his crease and wants to take off for a single. But better sense prevails eventually as he scampers back into his crease
straight as an arrow! Full on middle stump, and Rayudu skips down the ground and lifts this elegantly right over the bowler's head. A beautiful sight as the ball lands on the sightscreen
good lenth on middle, and turning into his body. Worked off his hips to the leg side for a single
good length on off, and he flicks this with the spin to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
fuller on middle stump, and this is carefully tapped away to midwicket
good length just outside off, and Rahul walks down the wicket. Bunts a shot down the ground to long on for one
back of a length outside off stump, and Rayudu punches this straight off the back foot. Nabi intercepts
full just outside off, and he leans into a front-foot defense
length ball outside off, and he fends this with soft hands and takes off for a quick single. Smart cricket from these two
rolls his fingers over this ball, and the delivery lands wide outside off. Easily dabbed to backward point for a quick single
good length just outside off. Slower ball again, and fended off the back foot to mid off
full on middle, and he drills a drive straight down the ground. Gulbadin sticks his right leg out, and the ball ricochets off his ankle and trickles away to cover
back of a length outside off, and he muscles a punch to mid off
slower ball to end the over. Full on off, and tapped down the ground to long on for a walking single
lands on off stump, and Rayudu walks down the ground. Tapped to mid on
good length on off, and spinning into his body. Punched down the ground to long on for one
good length on off, and he flicks it square to midwicket for a quick run
good length, but wide outside off. Cut off the back foot to deep point

full just outside off, and that's been chipped over midwicket to the deep. They're coming back for the second, but the direct hit from Gulbadin hits the bowler's stumps! Third umpire's replays show he's safe
good length outside off, spinning into his body, and he punches this off the back foot to deep extra cover for a single
good length outside off, and firmly caressed off the back foot to cover for a single
good length on off, and angling into his body. Bunted off the back foot to long on for a single

timed! Picks the slower ball (100kph) early and then simply lifts this off the front foot. Holds his pose for the camera and the ball soars over the infield. Lands just short of the boundary before trickling beyond for four
good length on middle, and flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
back of a length on off, and he muscles a punch past midwicket for a single

pulled away with disdain! Another slower ball (92 kph) and Rayudu picks it early. Lands short on off stump, and he muscles this over the boundary... into the hands of the Indian fans in the stands. How's that for a rhyming sequence!
full on of stump, and he walks down the ground to defend
good length just outside off, and he carves this square off the back foot past point. They walk across for a single and that's the team 100!
good length on off, and he works this off his pads to deep midwicket for a single. Fifty for Rayudu!
full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to cover for a quick single
lands on leg stump, and he opens his bat's face to tap this towards cover
length ball just outside off, and he cuts this square to deep point for a single
full on middle stump, and no spin off the first delivery. Rayudu muscles a drive to long off for a single
full outside off, and spinning into Rahul. He takes a big stride forward and pushes a square drive to cover point for a quick run
full outside off, and he picks the googly well! The ball's coming into his body, and Rayudu sweeps this over the infield for a boundary
flatter from Rashid. Lands on off stump, and skids through to Rayudu. Punched to mid off for a quick run
full and wide outside off. Spinning into Rahul, and he taps this off the front foot to point
full outside off, and spinning into Rahul once again. Defended with soft hands towards the leg side. Rahul stays on 49

it's a skyer, but taken at long on! Tossed up on leg stump, and Rayudu came down the wicket to clobber this into the stands, but he's mistimed the shot on this occasion and Najibullah does well in the deep to take a difficult catch near the ropes. Rayudu walks back after an electric knock. Drinks as well.
back of a length on leg stump, and he clips this off the back foot to deep midwicket. Gets to his 2nd ODI fifty!
full on off stump, and he picks this from outside the stumps, and drills an on-drive to long on for one
full on off, and straightening after pitching. Punched with the straight bat to mid off
tossed up on off stump, and Rahul toe-ends a drive past Nabi's outstretched hands to long off
full on middle stump, and tapped off the front foot by Rahul. A successful over for Afghanistan
full on leg stump, and clipped off his toes to square leg
length ball just outside off, and skidding through after pitching. Fended off the back foot
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover
full on middle, but spinning into DK's pads. He takes a big stride forward to defend, and the ball hits his front leg
full on leg stump, and DK's attempted flick hits his pad and trickles away to Javed at square leg
flat on off, and DK pulls this square to the cow-corner boundary! Rashid drags this down, and Karthik spotted the length early
good length on leg stump, and cramping the batsman for space. Fended off the back foot to mid off
reverse swept! Full on off stump, and Rahul switches his grip and then paddles this fine past the keeper's right! Short third man has absolutely no chance
good length on off, and he taps this off the back foot to point with the angled bat
tossed up on leg stump, and he flicks this off his toes to the outfielder on the leg side
full just outside off, and spinning into his pads. Rahul whips this to square leg, but the ball takes his inside edge

so close! Tossed up outside off, and Rahul comes down the wicket to slog over the bowler's head. But the ball takes an inside edge and whizzes past the leg stump. Chase for Aftab towards the fine-leg boundary, but a full-length last-ditch dive from the fielder saves a run
length ball on off stump, and fended off the back foot to cover point
full just outside off, and his attempted defensive shot goes past the outside edge. Shahzad whips the bails off and the third umpire wants to check the stumping. Rahul's back leg is inside the crease

the late finger of death from the umpire! But Rahul reviews after a consultation with DK. It was a full and fast delivery on off stump, and Rahul went for the reverse sweep. The ball landed on middle stump, and hit his back leg. Impact's definitely on middle, so now we await ball-tracking and UltraEdge. There was a slight noise as the ball passed the glove, but the umpire ignores it. Three reds say ball-tracking, and Rahul must go back!
good length just outside off, and defended off the back foot
back of a length on off, and turning away after pitching. Dhoni muscles a shot straight down the ground to long on for one
good length on off, and spinning inwards. DK rocks back, and flicks this off his hips to square leg
full outside off stump. Straightens after pitching, and MSD's front-foot defense takes an outside edge to short third man
full outside off, and spinning into Dhoni's pads. He misses the whip, and the ball hits his front leg. Impact's on middle stump, but probably missin the stumps
full outside off once more, and Dhoni sticks his pads outside the stumps to pad this away to the leg side. Nabi appeals for lbw again, but the umpire isn't interested
full on middle stump, and flicked off his toes to deep midwicket. Great communication between the batsmen to come back for the second run
full and wide outside off, and tapped off the front foot to short third man
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot.
googly tossed up wide outside off, mistimed drive can't beat the bowler
googly, short of a length and into the legs. Whipped to deep square's left off the back foot
short ball skids on too quick, he can't get the pull away. It rolls down to long-on
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
short on the pads, nudged straight to short fine
beaten on the outside edge and another rapid stumping from Shahzad. No appeal to back it though. This drew Karthik forward and spun past the edge
googly, full outside off. Flicked to long-on with a big stride
googly, short and in at off stump. Makes room and cuts to sweeper cover

tossed up on middle stump. Steps out and jabs at it, but can't beat the bowler to get the single at long-on. in fact there was a catching opportunity for the bowler. Coulldn't make it because he collided with the non-striker
length on middle stump, tapped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length on the pads, clipped through midwicket
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
dropped short and very wide. But he gets the cut off the bottom of the bat and can't get it past extra cover
short ball on off stump, pulled towards long-on who slips as he gets down to field this
short of a length just outside off, cut straight to backward point
short and wide outside off and he finds point again with the cut
length on off stump, sliced to point on the up
length outside off, cut to extra cover on the up
short of a length on off stump, backs away and jabs it past the bowler to steal a single from mid-off
quicker one pushed through outside off. Hurriedly pushed back down the pitch off the back foot
short ball on off, deep in the crease to pull to deep backward square
short of a length at off stump, backs away and taps to extra cover

given lbw! India don't have a review left. He's looked to play the flick, but he's caught on the pad in front of off stump. It's big stride through and there's a chance this could have spun down leg. But the umpire didn't think so and he will go. Ahmadi is excited with the wicket. he's hurt his wrists while punching the air He's been struck by short fine's throw on his wrist. Replays show that was missing leg stump
short ball on middle stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cuts to sweeper's left
short and turning away from outside off. Check-pull to midwicket
falls short of long-off. Nearly canes this full toss to that fielder. Wants to go wider, surely. But he hasn't got a lot of elevation on it and that saves him
length on off stump, driven with the turn to sweeper
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right and Pandey says yes to the second

great shot. Picked the googly and used the spin into him to slap this to the midwicket boundary. Afghanistan had brought him in and Karthik used the opportunity to drag this length ball from wide outside off
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
full on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, hurried push to middle stump

steps out and meets it on the full before launching it over midwicket. It's waist height by the time he gets to it and once again there's no one in the deep there. Karthik cashing in on the part-timers while he can
short on middle stump, mistimed pull to long-on's right
short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length on off stump, looks to tap through the covers but can't get this one past the pitch
full and into leg stump. Walks down at it but can't get the flick away. It rolls into the midwicket region
driven firmly into the stumps at the other end. One of his favourite shots, with his big backlift.
length outside off, looks to drive into the covers, gets an inside edge onto pad
yorker on leg stump, jams it into his boot as he looks to flick this
full on off stump, flicked down to long-on

past the inside edge and the keeper. Pandey with an angled bat against this length ball outside off. Looks like he wanted to chop this behind square before adjusting to block with a straight bat. But it had spun too much by then
short of a length just outside off, dabbed to point off the back foot
length on leg stump, tapped into the leg side
short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
beaten on the outside edge this time. Now he's looking to defend for the turn on the back foot and it doesn't do as much
length outside off, tapped into the leg side from deep in the crease
full toss above the waist and he can't get the pull away. It's high on the bat. Rolls out to deep square's right
leaves it alone expecting that to be wide, but this yorker has tailed back in. Good bowling from Aftab
full on off stump, tapped to short extra who misses the stumps at the non-striker's end. Karthik was lazy getting back and would've been gone
caught behind. A thin edge as Pandey slashes away from the body. It's a length ball, there's lots of width and the shot is on. But his feet have barely moved and he is gone
edge to third man! Nearly done first ball by an attempted yorker. He closes the face on it and it runs off the leading edge
length on off stump, walks across and drops this behind square with the angle
beaten as this slower bouncer slants back into him and he wants to ramp it. The original plan was to let that one go
crisp drive, but he can't get it past extra cover. Full ball outside off, nice weight transfer into it
length on leg stump, dropped in front of short fine and just makes the single at the other end as the throw comes in
length ball spinning into leg stump. Tapped to long-on off the back foot
length ball into the pads, nudged through square leg off the back foot
length outside off, rolls into the leg side off the inside edge as he pokes with hard hands on the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, dropped into the leg side with soft hands
short ball just outside off, tapped to extra cover's left off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and runs it to short third man
googly dropped short and spinning viciously down leg side. Can't get bat on this
googly at a length outside off, rapped on the inside part of the bat as he looks to defend on the front foot
length outside off, defended to point off the front foot
short ball just outside off, pulled to deep square's left
googly onto the pads, tapped to short fine's left
short ball down leg side, can't get bat on this
full on off stump, flicked towards long-on but midwicket runs across to his left to stop this
length outside off, goes back and turns this into the leg side
beaten. Short of a length outside off, opens the face and looks to run it past the keeper
short ball outside off, steered straight to short third man
short and wide outside off, spinning in from wide. Chopped to sweeper's left
short ball on middle stump, pulled to deep square
length on off stump, defended from deep in the crease
full outside off, driven to sweeper cover
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, makes a bit too much room as this spins away and his cut comes off the thick outside edge to dribble past short third man
short ball outside off, hurried pull to long-on
short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to sweeper's right allows him to come back for a second
short ball outside off, cut to sweeper's left
full on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, pushed to sweeper off the front foot
short ball outside off, cut to deep point
length on off stump, pushed through point with an open face
short and wide outside off, backs away and expertly nudges this past the slip fielder to bring up 200
length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, gets behind it it and turns it into the leg side
short ball turning and bouncing rapidly outside off. Looks to cut but this is steep and above the blade
length ball down leg side, can't get the flick away
full on off stump, flicked to midwicket with the turn
short and wide outside off, backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
length outside off, steps out and cops it on the pads after being beaten in flight
another one on the pad. This one skids straight on as he looks for the offbreak to try and play the flick
length on off stump, dead-batted off the front foot
full on middle stump, steps out and jams it back towards the bowler
length on off stump, dropped in front of short third man with soft hands
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square from the crease
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it to short third man
length ball spins in sharply and he just manages to keep this away despite the angled bat. Poor technique there

run-out appeal at the non-striker's end. This was a length ball that rolled back down the pitch off the leading edge. Mujeeb looked really confident after getting a touch on this...Jadhav is in a strange position! And he's out. He is front-on, facing the batsman, and is flapping his left hand backwards in panic when this hits the stumps. Doesn't have the mobility for it. He's gone.
dropped short on middle stump, goes back and pulls to deep midwicket's right
lots of turn! Lands full outside off, and rips into the batsman's body. He misses the front-foot defense and the ball hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw but not given. The correct decision
good length outside off, and he cut it to point off the back foot
good length just outside off, and fended away from his body to the off side

slow finger of death once again! Overpitched from Nabi, and the ball has hit his toe! A full-throated appeal from Nabi and the umpire raises his finger. Pitched on leg stump, and impact on leg too, but looks like the ball would've gone down leg. DK out for 44 after failing to connect with a straight ball
full on leg stump, and smartly clipped off his toes to fine leg. First ODI runs for Chahar as short fine-leg goes chasing after it
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full on middle, and Jadeja's flick towards the leg side, takes a leading edge to cover instead
full on middle stump, and Jadeja manages to shovel a shot to midwicket for a quick run
back of a length on off, and defended off the front foot
back of a length on off, and Chahar covers his off stump and fends towards point
length ball on middle, but going down leg. Chahar walks across to the off side, and flicks this fine to fine leg for one
low full toss on middle, and he muscles an on-drive to long on for a single
length ball on off, but angling into the left-hander. He muscles the ball to the leg side

big appeal for lbw! But not given. Quicker ball on off, and skidding right through. Jadeja defends down the wrong line as he comes down late for the shot, and the ball hit his back leg. Would've missed the stumps though
length ball on middle, and angling into his pads again. Hits his front leg once more as he misses the defense
Jadeja has no clue! Another quick one, landing full on off and spinning wildly into Jadeja's pads. Hits his front leg again, but the ball is doing too much
half-tracker outside of, and he finally manages to get bat on ball. Cuts it square to the fielder in the deep
good length on off, and spinning into the batsman. He muscles a pull to deep midwicket and manages to scamper back for the second as well
tossed up outside off, and it's a full toss. Jadeja thwacks this away - past the fielder at midwicket - for a single
just past the outside edge! Flighted full outside off, and spinning further away. Chahar tried to defend, but played it inside the line of the ball
googly to follow it up. Lands outside off, and spins inwards. Chahar works it off his hips to square leg
good length on off, and spinning further away. Allows Jadeja to free his arms, but he slaps this straight to cover
length ball on middle, but spinning into Jadeja's body. Hits his hip as he misses the swivel to pull
flighted on middle stump, and pushed down the ground to long on for a single
back of a length outside off, and Jadeja's cuts this legbreak straight to point. Excellent work by Najibullah inside the circle
good length on off, and straightening after pitching. Chahar tries to flick this towards the leg side, but misses. The ball hits his front leg, but impact's outside the stumps
full just outside off, and pushed with the spin to cover point for a quick single
extra bounce! Back of a length outside off, but spinning into Jadeja. He uncomfortably muscles this to the leg side for a single
good length wide outside off, and that's been punished by Chahar! Rocks back and cuts this smartly past the vacant point-region for a boundary. First four in six overs
overpitched on leg stump, and fended off the front foot. End of Mujeeb's spell (0 for 43)
back of a length outside off, but too slow from Aftab. Jadeja sticks his bat out and taps this to point for a quick single
overpitched outside off stump, and he toe-ends a drive towards the keeper. They scamper across for a single before Shahzad can get to the ball
full on middle, and angling into his pads. Flicked straight to midwicket
full on off, and he pushes this with soft hands to mid off. Nice early call for a single
cleans him up! Full and straight, and Chahar misses the leg-side flick. Gap between bat and pad, and the delivery sneaks through his defense! Hits his front leg, and then crashes into the stumps.
full on off, and defended onto his pads. The ball rolls away to cover as Aftab ends a successful over
good length outside off, and spinning further away. He sticks his bat out and taps this to point for a single. Asghar isn't happy that they conceded a run there
full on off, and carefully defended off the front foot
full on off, and Kuldeep keeps his eyes on the ball and caresses a square drive to the fielder in the deep for a single
good length outside off, and spinning away once again. Nudged square to Rahmat at point for another single
full on off, and Kuldeep carefully defends off the front foot. Afghanistan will take the dot
good length just outside off, and straightens after pitching. Hits the top of Kuldeep's bat and pops into the air but lands safe just beyond the fielder at cover. India need 23 off 24

full on middle, and he uses his wrists to whip this behind square to the fielder at fine leg. Early call for the second means that the batsmen are safe, but the throw from the deep hits Shahzad's gloves and then ricochets onto Samiuallah's face! He's going off.
slower ball outside off. Lands on a length, and Kuldeep taps this with soft hands and races off for a single to the other side
full on leg stump, and worked away to midwicket for a single. Hesitation of yes-no-yes-no as Rashid collects and throws down the stumps at the keeper's end. Is Kuldeep in? Yes!
attempted yorker on middle, but eventually a low full toss. Caressed down the ground to long on for a single
good length on middle, but angling down leg. Easily flicked off his pads to fine leg for one
back of a length outside off stump, but the slower ball has been pulled to deep midwicket. India need 17 off 18
full on middle, and spinning wildly past the outside of his bat. Jadeja tried to defend but his bat was nowhere near the ball
too full on middle, and he closes the bat's face to work this towards deep midwicket for a single
big appeal for lbw! But would've missed the stumps. Length ball on middle, but turning into his pads. Impact on leg stump, so an easy decision for the umpire
full on leg stump, and swept hard! Beats the fielder at square leg, but there's a fielder manning the boundary
full on middle stump, and Jadeja's quick to get down and defend with soft hands
flighted on middle, and he drives this low full-toss past the midwicket fielder. Chase for Najibullah near the boundary, but he manages to cut it off. India need 13 off 12

full on leg stump, and Kuldeep backs away and drives through the covers. Great impact off the bat and they're coming back for the third. Could be dangerous as the throw is flat from the deep. The bowler collects the ball and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end before Kuldeep can complete the third. Importantly that's two runs, and the strike is with Jadeja, but Kuldeep must walk back
back of a length on off, and he paddles a sweep into the gap on the leg side. A couple for Jadeja as Kaul responds well to his partner's call

short outside off, and Jadeja goes for the pull! He slices the shot, and it's in the air... but the ball falls short of Rashid at short midwicket. Rashid then picks up the ball and has a shy at the bowler's stumps, but he misses the direct hit. Kaul would definitely have been out
yorker on middle stump, and Jadeja pushes this down the ground to wide long-on for a single. Eight off eight

full and straight on middle stump, and that's been driven to mid on for a quick single. Hashmatullah picks the ball up and releases it super fast, and his throw gets the direct hit! The umpire goes up to the third umpire.. .and Kaul is short! India are nine down.
full on leg stump, and he flicks this to fine leg for a single. India need seven runs, Afghanistan need one wicket
half-tracker outside off, and spinning further away. Jadeja drags a slog towards the leg side, and the ball goes to deep midwicket. But Jadeja refuses the single

full on middle stump, and Jadeja slog-sweeps this into the boundary! Picks the legbreak well and smashes this towards the leg side. The ball hits the skirting right on the full and therefore the umpire needs to check. Will it be a four or a six? That's the million-dollar question. Given as a four
full on eg stump, and Jadeja flicks this to square leg for a single. Was that smart? Khaleel on strike. Two to win, one to tie

full outside off, and the googly has been inside-edged to short fine leg! Khaleel went for the drive, and he had no clue what Rashid had bowled. Chance of a direct-hit at the bowler's end too, but Khaleel survives. Scores are tied

back of a length outside off, and this spins into Jadeja. He mistimes a pull, and the ball goes straight in the air! Taken at midwicket, and the game is tied! The Indians are disappointed as Afghanistan celebrate. There's no Super Over folks. That's only for the final. Rashid takes a wicket off his worst delivery of the match, but Jadeja was cramped, and therefore paid the price. The Afghans celebrate as if they've won. The Indians are shell-shocked in the pavillion.
